issues.title: algorithim description form
issues.author: robinbryce
issues.body:
For the primary algorithms we have aligned with other specs (notably RFC 9162) in the use of "plain english" algorithm descriptions.

We have complimented that with python implementations.

We currently believe that python + helpful comments is more generaly useful. All things being equal, provided there is no specific process reason to have the plain english only version, we intend move the algorithm specifications to that form.

This issue has been created to track the choice we make here
